SELECT di.SourceId, di.SourceName, di.Longt, di.Lat, di.Rank, SUM(CASE WHEN fc.Conformance='不符合' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ConditionFlag, SUM(CASE WHEN lp.Conformance='不符合' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ProtectionFlag, MAX( (isnull(pu.FEI,0) +isnull(pu.AfterFEI,0))/2 ) AS UnitNum FROM TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di JOIN TB_BASE_COMPANY_INFO ci ON di.CompanyId = ci.CompanyId LEFT JOIN TB_BASE_DR_FACILITIES_CONDITION fc ON di.SourceId=fc.SourceId LEFT JOIN TB_BASE_DR_LEGAL_PROTECTION lp ON di.SourceId=lp.SourceId LEFT JOIN TB_BASE_PROCESS_UNIT pu ON di.SourceId=pu.SourceId WHERE di.SourceId IS NOT NULL
AND ci.CompanyName LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{searchCompanyName},'%'))
AND di.SourceName LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{searchSourceName},'%'))
AND di.Rank = #{searchRank}
GROUP BY di.SourceId, di.SourceName, di.Longt, di.Lat, di.Rank
SELECT pu.*, (ISNULL(pu.FEI, 0) + ISNULL(pu.AfterFEI, 0))/2 AS RealFEI FROM TB_BASE_PROCESS_UNIT pu WHERE pu.SourceId = #{sourceId}
